## Service() function

Indicates that an decorated class is a "service".


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function Service(identifier?: string): ClassDecorator;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  identifier | string | middleware name |

<b>Returns:</b>
